title: Italy : natural gas imports 2018 , by country of origin
yAxis: Natural gas imports in million cubic meters
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Natural gas imports in million cubic meters for 7 number of Countrys.
The Natural gas imports in million cubic meters is highest at Country Russia and lowest at Country Holland.
The highest Country Russia has 31318.0 more Natural gas imports in million cubic meters than the lowest Country Holland.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in the y axis.
The maximum Natural gas imports in million cubic meters 32321.0 is found at Country Russia and the minimum is found at Holland where Country is 1003.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Natural gas imports in million cubic meters for 7 number of Countrys.
The Natural gas imports in million cubic meters is highest at Country Russia and lowest at Country Holland.
The highest Country Russia has 31318.0 more Natural gas imports in million cubic meters than the lowest Country Holland.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in each Country on the y axis.
The Natural gas imports in million cubic meters is highest at Country Russia and lowest at Country Holland.
The difference of Natural gas imports in million cubic meters between the highest and lowest Country is 31318.0.
Country Russia is higher than any other Countrys with value 32321.0, followed by , and Qatar. Down to Country Holland with the lowest value 1003.0.
The Country Russia has 3.33 times more Natural gas imports in million cubic meters than average.
The Natural gas imports in million cubic meters is 67873.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
